name: Threshold Power #1
description:
You are stepping up into the realms of Threshold power today. In this workout, we are working closer to your current FTP and increasing the workload. Steady-state efforts just under your threshold will have you accustomed high-intensity efforts. The brief recovery period is preparing you for longer sustained intervals.
